Package edu.gatech.gtri.obm.alloy.translator

Class OBMXMI2Alloy

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.gatech.gtri.obm.alloy.translator.OBMXMI2Alloy
  • public final class OBMXMI2Alloy
extends Object
    A class to translate SysML Behavior Model in a xmi file into an alloy file.

    Example: 

     OBMXMI2Alloy translator = new OBMXMI2Alloy("C:\\alloylibs")
 if (translator.loadXmiFile(new File("C:\\OBMModel.xmi"))){
  boolean success = translator.createAlloyFile("Model::4.1 Basic Examples::4.1.1 Time Orderings::SimpleSequence",new File("C:\\output.als")));
      if (!success)
          System.out.println(translfator.getErrorMessages());
  }
  else
      System.out.println(translator.getErrorMessages());
  System.out.println(translator.getMessages());
    Author:
    Miyako Wilson, AE(ASDL) - Georgia Tech

      • OBMXMI2Alloy

        public OBMXMI2Alloy​(String _alloyLibPath)
        A constructor to set the given alloyLibPath as an instance variable.
        Parameters:
        alloyLibPath - - An absolute path name string for the required library folder containing Transfer.als and utilities(folder) necessary for translation.

    • Method Detail

      • loadXmiFile

        public boolean loadXmiFile​(File xmiFile)
                    throws FileNotFoundException,
                           edu.umd.omgutil.UMLModelErrorException
        loading xmiFile to preparing for translation
        Parameters:
        xmiFile - - xmiFile containing classes you like to translate to an alloy file.
        Returns:
        true if successful, otherwise return false
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException - - the given xmiFile does not exist
        edu.umd.omgutil.UMLModelErrorException - - the problem constructing utility objects from xmiFile

      • createAlloyFile

        public boolean createAlloyFile​(String qualifiedName,
                               File outputFile)
        Create an alloy output file of the qualifideName class/behavior model in the xml file. If this method return false, you may use getErrorMessages() to know why cause failure.
        Parameters:
        qualifiedName - of a UML:Class for translation (ie., Model::FoodService::OFSingleFoodService)
        outputFile - - the output alloy file
        Returns:
        boolean true if the given outputFile is created from the given xmlFile and the qualifiedName; false if fails.

      • getMessages

        public List<String> getMessages()
        Get messages collected while the translation a class.
        Returns:
        message - list of message strings

      • getErrorMessages

        public List<String> getErrorMessages()
        Get errorMessages collected while the translation a class.
        Returns:
        errorMessage - list of error message strings
